caption: Figure 1: Comparison of SEMIEVOL with previous SFT methods. SEMIEVOL enables interaction between diverse data types for superior performance evolution.
description: The figure compares the supervised fine-tuning (SFT) method with the proposed SEMIEVOL framework, highlighting SEMIEVOL's ability to leverage both labeled and unlabeled data for improved LLM adaptation.

caption: Figure 2: Overview of SEMIEVOL. It maximizes the utility of labeled data through a bi-level knowledge propagation-and-selection framework, while leveraging collaborative learning among multiple LLMs to exploit unlabeled data, thereby unleashing the full data potential.
description: The figure illustrates the SEMIEVOL framework, showing its three key components: knowledge propagation, collaborative learning, and knowledge adaptive selection, to leverage labeled and unlabeled data for improving LLM performance.
